results.title: Simvastatin suppresses tissue factor expression and increases fibrinolytic activity in tumor necrosis factor-alpha-activated human peritoneal mesothelial cells.
results.text_hl: In the presence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ @GENE_PLAT @GENE_5327 @@@t-PA@@@ synthesis in control and @GENE_TNF @GENE_7124 @@@TNF-alpha@@@-treated cells dose-dependently increased, reaching 5.8-fold and 7.7-fold higher @GENE_PLAT @GENE_5327 @@@t-PA@@@ levels, respectively, at 5 micromol/L @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ after 48 hours.

citations.NLM: Haslinger B, Kleemann R, Toet KH, Kooistra T. Simvastatin suppresses tissue factor expression and increases fibrinolytic activity in tumor necrosis factor-alpha-activated human peritoneal mesothelial cells. Kidney Int. 2003 Jun;63(6):2065-74. PMID: 12753293
